description: Configuration for initialize a MatGL Atoms2Graph Convertor.

element_types.description: The element types to consider, default is all elements.
element_types.title: Element Types

cutoff.description: The cutoff distance for the neighbor list. If None, the cutoff is loaded from the checkpoint.
cutoff.title: Cutoff

threebody_cutoff.description: The cutoff distance for the three-body interactions. If None, the cutoff is loaded from the checkpoint.
threebody_cutoff.title: Threebody Cutoff

pre_compute_line_graph.description: Whether to pre-compute the line graph for three-body interactions in data preparation.
pre_compute_line_graph.title: Pre Compute Line Graph

graph_labels.description: The graph labels to consider, default is None.
graph_labels.title: Graph Labels

title: M3GNetGraphComputerConfig
